title: The Most Favorite Champion of All Time [Voting Elimination] - SEMIFINALS, Thresh vs Azir
body:
**UPDATE:**

First of all, last group Winner is: **Jhin** (914 votes). Every champion that made it to Semifinals deserves a highlight, so good job to the fans! In the first round Rengar put a great fight, but Jhin had prepared some traps (4 precisely) and with another perfect round, it is Jhin who is going to the Finals and Rengar who will fight for the 3-rd place. Lets go to next round of SEMIFINALS, where we have Thresh vs Azir. **LET THE BEST WIN**.

**Trailer for the Battle:**
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nep0Ckgy1wA](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nep0Ckgy1wA)

Also please check out my [YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMVxkqVcf2KPo8dYfRcchJA) and my [Twitch Channel](https://www.twitch.tv/razyelxgaming) and if you somehow like my content, leave a subcribe/follow, it will make me happy!:)

Thanks for every support!:)

**BASIC INFO:**

Hello,

who is your favorite champion? And who is the most favorite champion of all 137 champions? Let's find out! I've created a bracked of all champions currently in the game. It will be up to you guys to decide who is the BEST champion. 

The **voting will last for 2 days**, then **1 champion with the most votes will make it to next round** and I will create another voting thread for next Group and so on, until there is only 1 winner.

The full Bracked can be found on my [FaceBook](https://www.facebook.com/RazyeLx) / [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RazyeLxGaming) or down below on the next link:

[https://imgur.com/EppHDVh](https://imgur.com/EppHDVh)

So lets get to it. Here are the 2 champions, that made it to Semifinals. Vote for your most favorite. Only 1 will make it to next round!:) You don't have your favorite here? Then vote for the one you like the most:)

If you have any questions, just ask:)

PS: Only votes on this thread count. I won't count any comments/votes on other pages, forums, etc.
PSS: You can find results of Round 1 and the results of Round 2 at the end of article in the last following groups
- Group P [HERE](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/BEEpWt0A-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-group-p)
- Round 2, Group IV. [HERE](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/iEE7vQu9-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-round-2-group-iv)
- QUARTERFINALS, [Rengar vs Kindred](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/q3vmFmVT-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-quarterfinals-rengar-vs-kindred)
- QUARTERFINALS, [Jhin vs Kled](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/nuwAQfAA-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-quarterfinals-jhin-vs-kled)
- QUARTERFINALS, [Ahri vs Azir](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/sp8ZOq6E-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-quarterfinals-ahri-vs-azir)
- SEMIFINALS, [Rengar vs Jhin](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/TodoJty7-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-semifinals-rengar-vs-jhin)

RazyeLx

{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

But... this is us praising God...

{{champion:268}} MOTHER FREAKING SHURIMA!!! {{champion:268}}
Vengeance for Ahri!

> [{quoted}](name=Raxistaicho,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6VL4mpmT,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-09-26T19:28:52.820+0000)
>
> Vengeance for Ahri!

More like praise the bird that destroyed the fox
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

SHURIMA IS MY CITY

AND IF IT WEREN'T FOR THIS BIRD

THEN THIS LEAGUE GAME WOULD BE SHITTY

NOW PASS AZIR ON TO THE FINALS

CUZ THIS BIRB WILL DEF STAY LITTY

Sweet dancing grenades from my hand.

I toss that.

Supa hot flower traps?

I drop that.

Four and a half ults?

I shot that.

(OOOOOOOOOOOH)

You know it's Azir, and I'm always bottom tier
Yes, I can carry, and no I'm not from... uh... Bilgewater?
(Note: If anyone can find a place name in League that rhymes with Azir you get a free iPhone X no scam)
MAKE SHURIMA GREAT AGAIN!
Do you have a moment to talk about Shurima? {{champion:268}}
http://i.imgur.com/hYjSqL9.gif
http://i.imgur.com/hYjSqL9.gif?noreply
Well in lore Nasus told them that Azir will stand against Xerath and sent her and Sivir to safety.

And now the anthem for the glorious kingdom that is Shurima!!!

https://media.tenor.com/images/b1b722a42a74c0ef5f1a2c6f135ae863/tenor.gif
im sorry thresh daddy but when shurima calls
{{sticker:sg-ahri-3}}  {{champion:412}}  {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}} {{champion:268}} {{sticker:sg-kiko}}

Kled > Jhin
Ahri > Azir
Literally every champion > Thresh

God, how did these 3 get to the top? Two of them are horribly uninteresting (Thresh/Azir) and only one is legitimately interesting (Jhin)

Seems more like you guys just voted on meme level.
Are you upset because Azir is too hard for you to play? Are you sad because you miss every hook and forget every lantern? Sounds like it.

What?

I didn't say it was because they were HARD.

I said it was because of MEME LEVEL.

I thought this was a "Most Favorite Of All Time" as in character wise, design wise, and gameplay wise. Azir and Thresh only hit 1 of those for me and thats gameplay wise. I find Thresh to be quite played out and irritating, and have literally no care for Azir's story although i'm iffy about his design. It goes both ways for me.

I find Thresh and Azir to be two very boring story/characters. Gameplay wise they're interesting, although I will admit I hate playing Azir, hes too slow and complex for my tastes. Thresh on the other hand is one of my favorite supports for his fuck you Q. 

I don't get why these two made it so far because other than their gameplay, they are quite boring champs. I honestly thought more good gameplay + good story characters would make it to the top rather than these two. If I (MAINLY) had a problem with how they functioned gameplay wise I would of actually mentioned that. The comparisons I put in my original comment were characters I thought exceeded both of those characters in all 3 aspects. And yes, obligatory shitting on Thresh because why not. 



Thanks for assuming I meant that though, I guess? Always gotta tie it back to skill, eh?

Edit: AND WHEN I SAY MEME LEVEL, I MEAN AS IN THE AMOUNT OF FUCKIN AZIR SHURIMA JOKES AND THRESH LUCIAN JOKES, DO YOU REALLY THINK TEEMO MADE IT TO THE TOP BECAUSE OF GAMEPLAY? FUCK NO MAN LOL

Are you telling me you hate any champion that gets memed?

And I really can't understand your hatred of Azir and Thresh's lore, as they are some of the better stories in League.

> [{quoted}](name=SeductiveGrandpa,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6VL4mpmT,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-09-26T22:13:22.157+0000)
>
> Kled > Jhin
> Ahri > Azir
> Literally every champion > Thresh
> 
> God, how did these 3 get to the top? Two of them are horribly uninteresting (Thresh/Azir) and only one is legitimately interesting (Jhin)
> 
> Seems more like you guys just voted on meme level.

no actually i just like serial killers and birds

Honestly, I can respect this level of honesty.

I like crazy people and alluring animal women.

My favorite champion is a psychopathic war veteran furry grandpa midget that rides an invincible lizard.
Yeah... sadly Jhins going to win :l
This has basically become a contest of "Who has better memes?"
I hate the Jhin memes, but I find Jhin to be an incredible character. :T

Thank you! Rengar didn't pull his tricks again.

I can easily see Azir winning this one. People say it's close, but I'd say it's pretty one sided.

Which means we will likely see Jhin vs Azir in the finals.......now *that* will be a close fight.
To all you Jhin lovers out there, if he wins he will be in first place, which means it is impossible to be 4th, so the logic is flawed, therefore don't vote from him

Someone said 4/4 = 1 so I guess they will try 

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
Shooreemah, Your Emperor Has Returned

Proud of my boi Azir for making it this far.

SHURIMA

Vote it up guyz if possible, so we get more votes.

Also if you are bored, come visit my [YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMVxkqVcf2KPo8dYfRcchJA) and if you somehow liked my videos leave a like and subscribe, it would make me happy:P

Thanks for every support!:)

PS: New trailer for current battle!:)

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nep0Ckgy1wA](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nep0Ckgy1wA)
How can I choose? Both have such cool mechanics and themes!
Pick Azir, with Riot reworking him he is finally starting to feel loved, don't take that away from him.
I loved my glorious sand emperor from the moment I first saw his trailer, it's a shame that Riot games is so scared of The Emperor's return to Greatness they keep trying to Nerf Azir.
SHURMEMA
SHURIMA
